stepLabel: Practice Drawing with the Apple Pencil!
instructions: Use the blank screen below as a drawing pad and practice drawing with the Apple Pencil! Treat the screen as just a normal piece of paper. Try writing your name, or drawing a circle to the best of your ability!

stepLabel: Familize Yourself with the Shapes You'll be Drawing
instructions: Carefully observe the 2 following animations of the figures you will be drawing in the test. Pay special attention to the drawing done by connecting vertices, as this drawing might be hard to follow in the beginning.
Trace the figure below as accurately as possible. Pay attention to the figure and the order of the strokes as described by the numbered arrows.
Reproduce the figure from the last step using the vertices given. Once again, pay attention to the figure and the order of the strokes as described by the numbered arrows.
Reproduce the figure from memory to the best of your ability.

Complete the following list of tasks: 

1. Count backwards from 100 to 50 by 7s. 

2. Alternate numbers and words through the entire alphabet (i.e. a1, b2, c3, d4, etc.). 

3. Count the number of syllables in the following words: interested, machine, perspective, neglected.
Reproduce the figure from the encoding step from memory to the best of your ability.
Given the following set of vertices, reproduce the figure from the encoding step to the best of your ability
Which of the follow best matches the figure from the encoding step? Record time till decision?
